description.oldValue:
Updates App (Microsoft 365) connector enables creation of Power Automate flows which trigger when an update is sent to the flow owner. Currently, the connector supports two triggers, 1) When a new update is received, 2) when a new update tied to a specific request is received.
GA date: March CY2023
description.newValue:
Updates App (Microsoft 365) connector enables
creation of Power Automate flows which trigger when an update is sent to the
flow owner. Currently, the connector supports two triggers, 1) When a new
update is received, 2) when a new update tied to a specific request is
received.
